name: Nathaniel's Basics Series Part 1
description:
You would not believe how stressful this was to continue with. I started 9 hours ago. Anyway, I remade it with some new stuff so look forward to that. Note that there is no title screen, name entry screen or warning screen, since they would not run the game. Part 2 coming soon.  Upon startup you will be taken directly to the school front. You can quit to the menu but the only available option is to play the first map.

Special thanks to:

ToffeeRecord for BBT6M Open Source Edition, Petrol Bot assets,  NTHLB OSTs and general help.

JimJamm for the Nathaniel character

Punkred66 for the swing screen used in this mod
